question: Assalamualikum Mufti saheb Please help in understanding this
answer:
QUESTION
1.There is An Aalim in India who shows the missing things in a saucer after reciting Arabic words. He tells where are the missing things and few things like who did jado on some one or if u have asrat whatever.he sees in the saucer and tell u who that is. Often times it?s very true. My question is is it allowed to ask him these things.because I have seen too much crowd at his place people asking about this stuff Is it haram to go and ask him to know about your health problems or missing things jAZAKALLAH KHAIR
ANSWER


Share:
A person who cures people from black magic or assist them to find lost items
is called an Aamil. If the Aamil is a pious and righteoss person, he may be
consulted as his practice will be within laws of Shariah. If an Aamil
violates any law of Shariah in his practice, it is not permissible to
consult him.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
